reviews.text: I don't know what this abomination of fusion restaurant is, but its not Japanese. Everything in the sushi was old, the rice, the fish. It was a very sad experience. And the prices are not easy to match the quality served.

People are smoking inside and waiters don‚Äôt care about it. I said there r explicit ‚Äúno smoking‚Äù signs but they just don‚Äôt care they even put ashtrays on every single table. Never coming again!

Great atmosphere, very comfortable.  Staff was very nice! I had the stone grilled tuna steak and tempura shrimp with the Italian strawberry lemonade. I enjoyed them all, I would certainly recommend. üëçüèΩüëåüèæ

The worst food I have ever tasted. The rice was raw and switched my red curry shrimp soup with someone else.
They don't seem to be bothered about your complaints not even the manager.
They've over changed me and didn't compensate for the wrong order.
I will not recommend eny one to go there.  If you want good customer service and be treated with respect dont waist your hard earned money in places like this,  they're absolute con and thieves,  watch out,  check your bill before paying.

We have been traveling for a long time and missed the delicious rolls.  Spotted this place at the food court.  But unfortunately the food was disappointing.  Philadelphia, in their opinion, looks like ordinary maki rolls with cheese on top (look at the photos).  Inside the roll there is only a little salmon.  Udon shrimp soup is very strange.  Why make crispy breaded shrimp and then dip them into soup?  It became soggy and unpleasant.  Hot rolls are quite tasty, but crackers are sweet.  it's like rolls with the taste of donuts)) the service is polite, the restaurant inside is pleasant, the prices are normal.  Work with food!
